Token.Abstract: @abstract Tells the delegate that the view is now in logged in mode

Parameter.Name: loginView
Parameter.Abstract: The login view that transitioned its view mode

Token.Abstract: @abstract Tells the delegate that the view is has now fetched user info

Parameter.Name: loginView
Parameter.Abstract: The login view that transitioned its view mode

Parameter.Name: user
Parameter.Abstract: The user info object describing the logged in user

Token.Abstract: @abstract Tells the delegate that the view is now in logged out mode

Parameter.Name: loginView
Parameter.Abstract: The login view that transitioned its view mode

Token.Abstract: @abstract Tells the delegate that there is a communication or authorization error.

Parameter.Name: loginView
Parameter.Abstract: The login view that transitioned its view mode

Parameter.Name: error
